divs: sighting detailsa ufo is nothing more then an apperition, much like that of fatima, that has all the power's of the world..each thought we have, they are the ones sending it to us... all of good though.... ufo's are not unidentifiable... they are hidden because some people think they are coming to give them the power of the mayans.... no no no they are the ones that gave the mayan's their knowledge, for trusting astronomy, astrology, and science over god.... go is all things holy, the indian's had it right, as did the 12 tribes of eden\israel.... it doesn't mattter what you follow... ufo's can manuver and speed up at unrealistic speeds, because they are not of this world, but the heavens..........
